channel.title: Npc teleport help
channel.description:
ok, i wanted to make a few npcs teleport you after you killed them for my new mini game, but when i added this peice of code [code]if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; teleportToX = 2717; // Change coordinates teleportToY = 9816; // Change coordinates }[/code]
underneather this, like the tutorial said so. [code]public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)[/code]
i got this error
[code]NPCHandler.java:758: ';' expected public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID) ^[/code]
when i aded the ; like it told me to i get these errors
[code]NPCHandler.java:760: illegal start of type if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2546); ^ NPCHandler.java:760: ']' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2546); ^ NPCHandler.java:760: ';' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2546); ^ NPCHandler.java:760: <identifier> expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2546); ^ 4 errors[/code]

item.title: Npc teleport help
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

ok, i wanted to make a few npcs teleport you after you killed them for my new mini game, but when i added this peice of code

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; teleportToX = 2717; // Change coordinates teleportToY = 9816; // Change coordinates }

underneather this, like the tutorial said so.

public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)

i got this error

NPCHandler.java:758: ';' expected public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID) ^

when i aded the ; like it told me to i get these errors

NPCHandler.java:760: illegal start of type if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2546); ^ NPCHandler.java:760: ']' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2546); ^ NPCHandler.java:760: ';' expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2546); ^ NPCHandler.java:760: <identifier> expected if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2546); ^ 4 errors

Read full topic
